My power point is pretty specific to Lynchburg, VA but you are welcome to use what you want from it.

answers.author: Emily Watson-Vincent
answers.text:
Here is the link to the presentation the City of Olathe used for our Public Outreach presentation this summer.  It is basically a 101 of how we budget. 
http://www.olatheks.org/files/purchasing/2011PublicOutreachPresentation_042810.pdf

author: Leslie Beauregard
text:
I am looking to refresh our Budget 101 presentation and am looking for any examples out there that we can "borrow" from :)  I usually give this presentation to citizens but this year, I want to expand to employees as well......so it needs to be full of information but not too technical.  
If you have something to share, would love to see what you are doing.
Thanks!
title: Budget 101 Presentation
